chapter.title: RedirectHelper
chapter.para: RedirectHelper allows the developer to redirect to a specific view id while also controlling the conversation and adding params.

section.title: Usage
section.para: The RedirectHelper can be @Injected and provides a fluent API to control the the desired redirect.

note.para: Seam Servlet must be included in your project or the injection point @Inject RedirectHelper will be unsatisfied!
